title: Disconnected all game
body: I starting playing a game with ashe adc and i was about 8 minutes in my game when i randomly get disconnected. I attempt to reconnect but it still wont let me. After about 5 attempts I somehow end up on my homescreen with no history of that match anywhere. Did someone possibly DDOS me?

replies.body:
You, hardly. More likely, someone tried to DDoS _the server_ on which your game was (common misconception: people believe you can DDoS one game, when instead it's more like hundred of games at once), or the server crashed for other reasons (dropping the games as a result).

Still, not much can be done unfortunately :/ Rito is upping security to make DDoSs harder, but plain true crashes can still happen, and attacks themselves cannot be _prevented_, only made a lot harder. It's like an arms race.
